interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Easydew Daily Double Hydra Cream 2.02 fl oz - Moisturizing Cream with EGF & Serine of NMFHydrating, Soothing, Anti-Aging EGF, Serine - N.M.F(Natural Moisturizing Factors) for Oily, Sensitive, Acne-Prone, Dry Skin Types Review Date: 2020/09/19 Store: EASYDEW Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '5.2911 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,Oily,Sensitive,All Skin Types', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 1.69 x 1.46 inches; 3 Ounces'} Review Text: I recently got some sort of skin reaction that I couldn’t apply my normal goto skin care products. I tested this Easydew daily double hydra care cream on my wrist first then started applying minimum amount on my face. Ever since I started using this cream my face was clearing up, my face was becoming normal. Partially I was eating clean and minimized my skin care but, still I really do think this product helped me out a lot.

I would highly recommend this product who has sensitive skin and even normal skin type people as well. This product is very mind and soothing. I would highly recommend this product! Review Title: Very soothing and mild on skin Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LDR by Baysyx - Restorative Glow Hydro Boost Moisturizer | Nourishing Hydration Cream with Collagen Stimulation | Fortified with Hyaluronic Acid | Made in The USA from Natural Ingredients (1.7 Oz) LDR {'Brand': 'LDR', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 1.2 x 1.1 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '725835779579', 'Manufacturer': 'LDR'} According to this Biomarine Hydro Boost moisturizer bottle, this moisturizer is made with natural ingredients that help stimulate collagen production to fill in fine lines and wrinkles, while helping to keep your face moisturized. As they claimed I’ve been putting this moisturizer day and night time. It’s a bit early to tell if my fine lines and wrinkles are reduced. However, my face was hydrated after use without having any skin issues. My husband is struggling with dry skin lately due to the weather. I recommend him to use this since this product is for men and women. He’s been liking this moisturizer. He said this has decent scents without being too overwhelming. My husband and I both like this moisturizer. I would recommend to people. Decent face moisturizer Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis Face Toner, 6.76 Fl Oz {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.85 x 2.76 x 7.44 inches; 8.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '501000', 'Manufacturer': 'Embryolisse'} Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis, Face Toner contains Rose, orange blossom, cornflower and hamamelis natural origin flower waters purify and tone the skin after cleansing. I found this Eau de Beaut Rosamlis leaves a very soft and comfortable skin, its texture is tighter, and the complexion is glowing and fresh. I use this toner to refresh skin at any time during the day. This toner is light weigh and very gentle on the skin. I really like this toner! Great daily facial toner 24K Gold Under Eye Mask - Eye Patches Treatment for Puffy Eyes Pure Collagen Golden Anti-aging Dark Circles Eye Bags Wrinkles Pads Masks Cooling Eye Spa Hydrogel Undereye patch - 20 Pairs (GOLD) MOSTORY {'Brand': 'MOSTORY', 'Item Form': 'Pads', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti Aging', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Special Feature': 'Anti Aging', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.86 x 1.65 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} I get super puffy very often especially in the mornings. I popped these open before I put on make up. I didn’t see much differences. Except cooling since they were in the refrigerator. The product is made in China as well. If someone is interested in where it’s made. Okay ABOUT ME MediAnswer Collagen Firming Up Mask 4ea (1box) 25g - 77% Pure Collagen Extract Anti-Aging Total Care Facial Mask Sheet, Powerful Hydrating and Anti-Wrinkle Night Skin Care Samyang {'Brand': 'Samyang', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 6.3 x 0.9 inches; 0.88 Ounces'} ABOUT ME MediAnswer Collagen Firming Up Mask is made with 77% Pure Collagen Extract The collagen supposed to help Anti-Aging Total Care, Powerful Hydrating and Anti-Wrinkle. I like the mask sheets. The sheets are very interesting without being messy. These masked helped me a lot to calm my skins after getting lots of sun from Florida. I would recommend these masks Collagen! Cancun Collection Cacao Body Bronzer – Superfood Infused Sunless Tanning Lotion with Cacao 5.1 fl.oz, For Instant Tan in 1 minute. Cancun Collection {'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Cancun Collection', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 4.6 x 1 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '659436986640'} This is my first time using Cancun collection body bronzer. I have to say I love this product! I have odd patch between my neck and chest area. This body bronzer did great job on hiding and blending into my body without looking crazy. This bronzer did not make me look like an orange either. I like the clean ingredients that this bronzer contains. I would recommend this bronzer. So far I am in love with this!

++ I would recommend to apply this bronzer with a bronzer glove if can. That’s the best way to get the best result. Superfood infused! [the SAEM] Derma Plan Cleansing Bubble Pad 15pcs - One Step Gentle Makeup Cleansing Wipes Produce Fine & Dense Bubbles, Hypoallergenic Formula, Pore Clean, Mild Exfoliation THESAEM {'Brand': 'THESAEM', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '15.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 3.9 x 1.8 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} I never used the SEAM’s skin products before. I told myself why not try one?! So I did! The pads are bigger than my goto face cleaning pads which I really like. One pad does a long way around my face even to neckline. This bottle has got plenty of liquid to work on. Also, I didn’t notice any irritation after using this bottle. Overall, I like the scent, it is mild. Also, I like the inexpensive price point. This bottle works for me. I hope my review helps! Inexpensive, great daily face pads Easydew 2-Step Face Contour Sheet Mask - Tightening & Anti-Aging & Hydrating Korean Face Mask with DW-EGF, Hyaluronic Acid for Anti-Winkle, Reducing Fine Line & Producing Collagen (Qty 5) EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 6.38 x 0.63 inches; 7.44 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'EETS1003', 'Manufacturer': 'CleveAid'} My friend told me about this brand and this face masks. I was so curious to try. I am in my 30’s now. I do happen to use a lot more of anti wrinkle products these days. I like the masks because the ingredients are good for anti wrinkle, I noticed the masks moisturize well after use them. I like the concept and the ingredients as well. I am going to have to purchase more in the future after I run out! Worth the hype! [Abib] Creme coating mask Tone-up solution 17g (5pcs) Abib {'Brand': 'Abib', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Number of Items': '5', 'Package Dimensions': '8.7 x 6.2 x 0.8 inches; 8.01 Ounces'} I’ve used Abib’s cooling masks before. I think like this toning mask sheets more. Because, the mask sheets are thick, lock all the moistures while wearing the mask sheets, leave soft and smooth skin afterward. I didn’t notice dramatic tone-up effect. But, overall I love the concept of the mask sheet, very moisturizing they are. I wish Abib company could minimize the packing later on. Other than that I’m very happy with these non drying your skin masks! Suitable for dry skin Dr. Denese Cannabis Sativa Super Serum with Soothing Calming Organic Cold-Pressed Hemp Oil, Ginger, Bisabolol, Ceramides - Reduce Look of Wrinkles, Moisturize & Improved Tightness - Cruelty-Free - 2oz Dr. Denese {'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Sensitive, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Dr. Denese', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Dr. Denese', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 2.6 x 1.7 inches; 2 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Dr. Denese'} First time trying Dr. Denese products. I often see it either online or at the drugstore. I apply a few drops at night time. This serum makes my face much brighter and clear looking. However, I found no expiration date on the box nor on the product. Other than that this product works well on my skin type ( I have normal skin type with oily T zone). I would recommend trying if you’re in mid 30’s like myself. It’s great. Love the serum but not expiration date Karuna Oh, Glow On Face Mask Sheet, Skincare and Beauty Facial Masks with Moisturizing and Collagen Promotion Properties for Healthy Glow, Contain Green Tea, Vitamin C and Pineapple (3 Sheets) Karuna {'Brand': 'Karuna', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrate Skin,Hydrate', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 4.88 x 0.87 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MSF1004 - CA', 'UPC': '857950007166'} Every time I find a beauty brand I try going to their websites and learn about their ingredients, where the products are manufactured. I assumed the products were made somewhere in California with USA ingredients. But, I noticed that the product is made in Taiwan. No offense to the country. But, I’ve never used a beauty product manufactured in Taiwan before.

I do like the fact that the masks are made without toxic ingredients. Also, mask is okay. But, I wish the company put where the products are manufactured on amazon page. Also, thought that the price was overpriced. 3 product for $18 is too much. Not so “hip” than you think. Karuna Hit Refresh Eucalyptus Fiber-Infused Sheet Mask: Burst of Hydration & Refreshing Glow, 3 Count Karuna {'Brand': 'Karuna', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 4.88 x 0.71 inches; 4.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MSF1006 - CA', 'UPC': '857950007159'} The product is okay. I didn’t feel these masks were better than other masks that I’ve used before. Also, the masks are not made in USA. They are made in Taiwan. Cool advertisement but, it’s 3 masks for $18. It’s a pass for me. Overpriced. Easydew Daily Double Hydra Cream 2.02 fl oz - Moisturizing Cream with EGF & Serine of NMFHydrating, Soothing, Anti-Aging EGF, Serine - N.M.F(Natural Moisturizing Factors) for Oily, Sensitive, Acne-Prone, Dry Skin Types EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '5.2911 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,Oily,Sensitive,All Skin Types', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 1.69 x 1.46 inches; 3 Ounces'} I recently got some sort of skin reaction that I couldn’t apply my normal goto skin care products. I tested this Easydew daily double hydra care cream on my wrist first then started applying minimum amount on my face. Ever since I started using this cream my face was clearing up, my face was becoming normal. Partially I was eating clean and minimized my skin care but, still I really do think this product helped me out a lot.

I would highly recommend this product who has sensitive skin and even normal skin type people as well. This product is very mind and soothing. I would highly recommend this product! Very soothing and mild on skin
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user remains dedicated to skincare that enhances moisturization and freshness, focusing on thicker sheet masks with hydrating and anti-wrinkle properties. They have recently shown an interest in soothing creams that cater to sensitive skin, incorporating serums with natural ingredients for brightening and tightening effects alongside cream formulations, toners, and body bronzers for sunless tanning.

- **Ingredients:** There is a strong preference for natural components that promote collagen production and gentle purifying effects, with a consistent emphasis on anti-aging benefits. The user is particularly vigilant about product labeling, advocating for non-toxic, ingredient-focused skincare that balances quality with affordability.

- **Usage:** The user integrates skincare into both morning and nighttime routines, seeking products that enhance moisture retention and skin smoothness through various serums, gentle cleansing options, and bronzers.

- **Performance Expectations:** They look for noticeable results in reducing fine lines and wrinkles, favoring products that deliver immediate cooling and hydration, all while remaining cautious about skin reactions and sensitivities.

- **Sharing & Recommendations:** Actively sharing their skincare experiences, they recommend hydrating sheet masks, soothing creams, and effective serums while emphasizing the importance of affordability in overall skincare.

- **Scent Preference:** Moderate fresh scents are preferred, while they remain open to effective unscented options.

- **Family Considerations:** The user seeks versatile skincare products suitable for all family members, emphasizing practicality and effectiveness for a range of skin types.
